body_html:
I actually have a patch ready, but I will need to test my patch.
Once all my changes are in, we will not even need the option in configure script.
bazel build --config=mkl tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
will allow you to build a pip package with mkl support.

I actually have a patch ready, but I will need to test my patch.
Once all my changes are in, we will not even need the option in configure script.
bazel build --config=mkl tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
will allow you to build a pip package with mkl support.
body:
I actually have a patch ready, but I will need to test my patch.
Once all my changes are in, we will not even need the option in configure script.
`bazel build --config=mkl tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
will allow you to build a pip package with mkl support.
